name: Frogadier

passive.name: Substitute
passive.effect: Once per turn, if Frogadier would take damage, you may discard a Trainer card to take half that damage (rounded up).

attacks.name: Water Shuriken
attacks.effect: Put 2 damage counters on 3 of your opponent's Pokemon (on different Pokemon).

flavor: Their mastery of ninjutsu has their shurikens getting more and more accurate. While they've put away their tongues, proper dojos will teach them to rely more on the water.
